name: Undeads
introduce: Undeads is a multiplayer MMORPG game with large selection of income-producing mechanics design to earn crypto while playing and interacting with other players. The game is an isometric survival game with action-combat set in a post-apocalyptic metaverse with an emphasis on a resource-oriented conflict between two factions: Zombies and Humans. Players have to explore new territories, push off and defend their settlement, grind resources, craft & improve equipment, trade, learn a profession and develop their NFT character.
